ALEAC.PA.summary: EdiliziAcrobatica S.p.A. engages in the outdoor construction works in Italy. It provides a range of services, such as renovation, restoration, cleaning, and installation and maintenance. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Genova, Italy. EdiliziAcrobatica S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Arim Holding S.r.l.

B.MI.summary: Bastogi S.p.A., through its subsidiaries, operates in the real estate, entertainment, art and culture, and other sectors in Italy. The company develops and operates real estate properties; manages multi-purpose venues for music, shows, and sport, as well as venues held through concessions; and produces musical and theatre contents. It also hosts presentations, business conventions, conferences, shows, fashion shows, exhibitions, cultural appointments, photo shoots, receptions, and gala dinners; and provides integrated services for the management, enhancement, and conservation of works of art and precious objects. In addition, the company manages a four star business hotel; and offers trade services to small and medium companies, as well as a range of services in the education and training, food and wine, design, and organization and location for events. Bastogi S.p.A. was founded in 1862 and is based in Milan, Italy.

In addition, the company manages a four star business hotel; and offers trade services to small and medium companies, as well as a range of services in the education and training, food and wine, design, and organization and location for events. EDAC.MI.summary: EdiliziAcrobatica S.p.A. engages in the outdoor construction works in Italy. It provides a range of services, such as renovation, restoration, cleaning, and installation and maintenance. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Genova, Italy. EdiliziAcrobatica S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Arim Holding S.r.l.

PGC.F.summary: Poligrafica S. Faustino S.p.A. engages in the printing business in Italy. It is also involved in direct marketing, electronic document management, e-procurement, and creation of tools for games and competitions. In addition, the company produces labels and packaging products; and operates as a digital marketing agency. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Castrezzato, Italy.

PSF.MI.summary: Poligrafica S. Faustino S.p.A. engages in the printing business in Italy. It is also involved in direct marketing, electronic document management, e-procurement, and creation of tools for games and competitions. In addition, the company produces labels and packaging products; and operates as a digital marketing agency. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Castrezzato, Italy.

SGC.MI.summary: SG Company S.p.A. provides live and digital communication services for B2B, B2C, and BTL markets. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Milan, Italy.

SIO.MI.summary: Sirio S.p.A operates in the hospital catering sector in Italy. It also operates franchised stores under the Burger King brand name. Sirio S.p.A was founded in 1993 and is based in Ravenna, Italy.

VE.MI.summary: Visibilia Editore S.p.a. edits, publishes, and distributes furniture, hi-tech, and cinema related brochures, journals, and periodicals in Italy. The company also provides technical and editorial assistance and consultancy services. In addition, it collects and manages advertising in periodicals by printed paper, as well as in digital formats through customized solutions using the Google AdWords platform. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Milan, Italy. Visibilia Editore S.p.a. is a subsidiary of Visibilia S.r.l.
